name: Colour the World
description:
*Please note that this game is still in development*

The game is about a pair of two twins who live in a world completely devoid of colour. 

After a trip to an abandoned temple. The twins awaken the ancient deities that give each of them a magical paintbrush, the deities task them with restoring colour to this husk of a world. 

Players will explore the world, seeking out various colour shards contained within each level.

HOW TO PLAY:

The game can be played with Keyboard/Mouse, as well as an Xbox One Controller.
